I'm working on a tool for understanding obstacles 🚧 and overcoming them in a way that feels easy, friendly and safe. This is my work diary. Feel free to reach out with questions, feedback, ideas. 💁‍♀️

🇬🇧 Most of my posts are in English, but there's some in German, too.

Author based in Sydney, Australia #mjjmori #author #writer #shortstories #novels #poems #sydney #australia #literature #sf #fantasy #dreaming Completed #NaNoWriMo 2023, used it to get down a draft text an SF Novel called “Volition” that’s been brewing in my head for a decade. 😁 Slowly working on second draft now.
Also working on a couple short stories and poems, but who isn’t, right? :-)

I'm a lot of things, including a novelist, playwright, and poet. Pagan. Dedicant of the Morrigan. Old salt. Nonpartisan ecosocialist hermit. We are the resistance. Friend of crows, rescuer of dogs, adopter of donkeys. Trans ally. he/him #pwME
